message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to significantly enhance productivity and streamline your workflow. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Let's start with an offer of $15000. I'm confident this investment will pay off for you in the long run.

I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000, which is a fair price considering the product's features and quality. I'd like to know if you can meet me at this price.
